domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

text: @OCzukay it's a creative want. they'll make you believe you need it. Friends of mine say they won't sign 5G petitions because  "they want 5G" but can't give me a single reason why except "it's better than 4G" 🤦‍♂️ I'm not even a 5G/Corona person. I'm a 5G is weapons tech person
